overview: Just as San Francisco debutante, Jessica Poole, is set to get married, her absentee father arrives, disrupting the household of his ex-wife.  Is he there to break up the wedding?  Or to steal back his ex-wife?  Or is Pogo finally ready to be a father after all these years?
tagline: He came 8000 miles to attend his daughter's wedding-and then tried 8000 ways to break it up
title: The Pleasure of His Company
